```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment=NA)
```

# Add Libraries

```{r loadLibraries, message=FALSE}
library(processNC)
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
library(here)
```

# Get the cropped files

```{r getFile}
pa <- paste0(here(), "/data/netcdf/19990908_cr.nc")
print(pa)
```   

```{r makeRaster}
SST <- raster(pa)
SST
```
# Make the plot

```{r plotMap}
# for some reason we need to divide temperature by 10...
# see https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/graphics/versions/3.6.2/topics/image
# image(SST/10.0)
plot(SST/10.0, main="SST", xlab = "Latitude", 
     ylab = "Longitude")
```
